dmca.title: [EV1-C978514S] TradeMark Violation: xtreme-hosting-inc.com
dmca.body:
Trademarked domain name, resolves to 70.85.214.53 (Dallas) ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. TradeMark Violation: xtreme-hosting-inc.com Added by system at Friday, Sep 15 2006 11:22 pm X-MailFrom: admin@xtreme-host.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Sep 15 23:22:41 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 15 Sep 2006 23:22:03 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 15 Sep 2006 23:22:03 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from admin@xtreme-host.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GORgp-0004pq-5v for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 15 Sep 2006 23:22:03 -0500 Received: from theweddingandpartyprofessionals.com ([216.187.107.164] helo=x1.xtreme-host.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from admin@xtreme-host.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GORgk-000Jg8-Oj for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 15 Sep 2006 23:21:58 -0500 Received: (qmail 7592 invoked by uid 10464); 16 Sep 2006 00:21:46 -0400 Received: from 74.107.17.23 by x1.xtreme-host.com (envelope-from , uid 2020) with qmail-scanner-2.01st (clamdscan: 0.88.3/1884. perlscan: 2.01st. Clear:RC:1(74.107.17.23):. Processed in 0.034943 secs); 16 Sep 2006 04:21:46 -0000 Received: from cpe0007e9cf069f-cm001404933f1e.cpe.net.cable.rogers.com (HELO xtremework) (74.107.17.23) by xtreme-host.com with SMTP; 16 Sep 2006 00:21:46 -0400 Message-ID: <002201c6d947$a0ab3cc0$0900a8c0@xtremework> From: "Dan Hancock" To: Cc: , Subject: TradeMark Violation: xtreme-hosting-inc.com Date: Sat, 16 Sep 2006 00:20:33 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0005_01C6D925.ECBCEEA0" X-Priority: 1 X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869 Disposition-Notification-To: "Dan Hancock" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of xtreme-host.com designates 216.187.107.164 as permitted sender) client-ip=216.187.107.164; envelope-from=admin@xtreme-host.com; helo=x1.xtreme-host.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 16 Sep 2006 04:22:03.0216 (UTC) FILETIME=[A9411D00:01C6D947] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) You are currently hosting a website which is violating our Legally registered trademark: -------------------------------- 70.85.214.53 xtreme-hosting-inc.com. NS IN 14400 ns2.netlinkinfo.com. xtreme-hosting-inc.com. NS IN 14400 ns1.netlinkinfo.com. -------------------------------- IP trace: -------------------------------- NetRange: 70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 CIDR: 70.84.0.0/14 NetName: NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13 NetHandle: NET-70-84-0-0-1 Parent: NET-70-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM Comment: RegDate: 2004-07-29 Updated: 2006-02-17 -------------------------------- This site has used our registered trademark all over it's website and has stolen our corporate name and identity. The owner of the site (xtreme-hosting-inc.com) refuses to remove our legally registered trademark material from thier website. We have contacted them several times and are we currently in the process of civil action against the owner/operator of this site for this violation. We are requesting that you either shut this account off due to the fact that they are breaking your TOS or AUP and violating International copywrite and trademark laws, or that you contact the owner(has proven to be quite hard to get a hold of), and request that they remove any reference to our Trade Mark. We do realize that netlinkinfo.com is most likely a reseller of your services, and thus we have also reported this to them and the domain name registrar for this domain name. In the case that netlinkinfo.com is infact a reseller of yours, then we would request that you also contact them regarding this issue to ensure that they take action against this serious violation which is damaging our Company Image and business. Our registered trade mark is: Xtreme Hosting Inc. Our registered trademark number is TMA672204. This can be easily confirmed through the Canadian government site here: http://strategis.ic.gc.ca/app/cipo/trademarks/search/viewTrademark.do;js essionid=0000WZN5VcQdZzLJDHd3GcGGbCM:vjite1ad?language=eng&fileNumber=12 68042&extension=0&startingDocumentIndexOnPage=1 Please send me your plans as to how you will be handling this issue. Thank you. Dan Hancock Xtreme Hosting Inc. admin@xtreme-host.com 647 477 2193 The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged. It is intended solely for the addressee. Access to this email by anyone else is unauthorized. If you are not the intended recipient, any disclosure, copying, distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it, is prohibited and may be unlawful. MIME element (text/html)
You are currently hosting a website which is violating our Legally registered trademark:
--------------------------------
70.85.214.53
xtreme-hosting-inc.com. NS IN 14400 ns2.netlinkinfo.com.
xtreme-hosting-inc.com. NS IN 14400 ns1.netlinkinfo.com.
--------------------------------
 
IP trace:
--------------------------------
NetRange:   70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255
CIDR:       70.84.0.0/14
NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13
NetHandle:  NET-70-84-0-0-1
Parent:     NET-70-0-0-0-0
NetType:    Direct Allocation
NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM
NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM
Comment:   
RegDate:    2004-07-29
Updated:    2006-02-17
--------------------------------
 
This site has used our registered trademark all over it's website and has stolen our corporate name and identity. The owner of the site (xtreme-hosting-inc.com) refuses to remove our legally registered trademark material from thier website. We have contacted them several times and are we currently in the process of civil action against the owner/operator of this site for this violation.
 
We are requesting that you either shut this account off due to the fact that they are breaking your TOS or AUP and violating International copywrite and trademark laws, or that you contact the owner(has proven to be quite hard to get a hold of), and request that they remove any reference to our Trade Mark.
 
We do realize that netlinkinfo.com is most likely a reseller of your services, and thus we have also reported this to them and the domain name registrar for this domain name. In the case that netlinkinfo.com is infact a reseller of yours, then we would request that you also contact them regarding this issue to ensure that they take action against this serious violation which is damaging our Company Image and business.
 
Our registered trade mark is: Xtreme Hosting Inc.
 
Our registered trademark number is TMA672204.
 
This can be easily confirmed through the Canadian government site here: http: //strategis.ic.gc.ca/app/cipo/trademarks/search/viewTrademark.do;jsessio nid=0000WZN5VcQdZzLJDHd3GcGGbCM:vjite1ad?language=eng&fileNumber=126 8042&extension=0&startingDocumentIndexOnPage=1
 
Please send me your plans as to how you will be handling this issue.
 
Thank you.

Dan Hancock
Xtreme Hosting Inc.
admin@xtreme-host.com
647 477 2193
